titleStmt.title: [Newe sonets and pretie pamphlets] [written by Thomas Howell]
titleStmt.author: Howell, Thomas, fl. 1568-1581.

notesStmt.note: Title and imprint from STC (2nd ed.).
Fragment. Signatures D₄₋₅ only. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
